New Records: Rilee Rossouw scored a century in the match.
Anrich Nortje took a four-wicket haul in the match.
Key Match Events: South Africa scored 205 runs in their innings.
Bangladesh collapsed after a strong start, losing key players quickly.
Anrich Nortje's bowling performance was crucial in the match.
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa won the toss and decided to bat first.

Post-Match Reflections: South Africa's win boosted their net run rate in the tournament.
Bangladesh's batting performance was criticized for not converting starts into substantial scores.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a significant victory for South Africa in the tournament.
